how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Step 1, No. 3 Hair Perfector Pre-Shampoo Hair Repair Treatment:.-Apply to damp hair, before shampoo and conditioner..-Apply a generous amount from roots to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated..-Leave on for up to 10 minutes..-Rinse. ..Step 2, No. 4 Bond Maintenanceu2122 Strengthening Hair Repair Shampoo:.-Dispense a coin-size amount and work into a lather..-Apply to wet hair and lather well..-Rinse. ..Step 3, No. 5 Bond Maintenanceu2122 Strengthening Hair Repair Conditioner:.-Apply to mid-lengths and ends of clean, wet hair..-Let sit for one to three minutes..-Rinse...When to use:.-No. 3 Hair Perfector Pre-Shampoo Hair Repair Treatment can be used once a week or two to three times a week for damaged hair..-No. 4 Bond Maintenanceu2122 Strengthening Hair Repair Shampoo and No. 5 Bond Maintenanceu2122 Strengthening Hair Repair Conditioner can be used daily or any time you wash your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started doing hair at 16 years old, I've been a licensed cosmetologist for over 20 years and I can honestly say in all my time in the beauty industry I've never seen a product truly change the game the way Olaplex has! It really blows my mind that this brand was first developed in a garage in California! Olaplex has totally changed what us hairstylists are capable of achieving with our clients. The Strong Days Ahead Set is a perfect set for at home up keep, it keeps the bonds of hair strong between visits to the salon and I highly recommend it to friends, family and clients. If your looking for a shampoo and conditioner that smells amazing this isn't it, the olaplex #4 and #5 doesn't have any beautiful fragrance added or anything to make it feel or smell luxurious but was made for the health of your hair, they have a light clean scent that isn't really noticeable at all honesty. But the shampoo will last quite awhile when used properly because it's ultra concentrated, a little really goes a long way as it's really thick and suds up immediately when water hits it. The conditioner is the same way, you don't need alot. Alot of people will probably be confused as to how to properly use the #3 Hair Perfector so definitely read and follow directions. I personally like to do a light shampoo first and then towel dry my hair because I don't wash my hair every day and I do use styling products and on occasion hair spray so I like to remove any product and oil from my hair prior to applying the #3, then I towel dry my hair really well go remove as much moisture as possible so the #3 is at its fullest strength after applying, then I allow it to sit for a minimum of 10 minutes, you can allow it to sit on the hair for longer but it should be a minimum of 10.. Then another shampoo and condition with the #5 and you'll be amazed at how healthy and strong your hair will feel. This set will help restore shine, luster, lost curl pattern and more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love the shampoo in this set but might stick to my conditioner for curly hair. I really love how much the shampoo foams up, it really helps my scalp feel clean but doesnu2019t strip it! The pre wash mask adds a nice shine that I love but obviously you only are supposed to really use it every so often. The conditioner is also nice but I donu2019t think I would use it in place of my normal curly hair conditioner because the result after showering without adding curl cream is a decent amount of frizz and my curls arenu2019t really defined. The value of the set is apparent, but going forward I probably would only really buy the shampoo and not a full set like this. For someone who has dry/damaged or straight hair not needing a curl definition, I would say this is a go to, salon quality set.

reviews.review_text: This Strong Days Ahead Shampoo and Conditioner set are my new holy grail hair products. Let's start with the shampoo - first off, the scent is absolutely worth the price alone. The conditioner is the perfect compliment to follow for my light and fine hair, it was thick enough to condition my ends but light enough that it didn't weigh my hair down or feel like it left any residue. These are salon style products for a reason. The last shining star of this trio is the hair perfecter mask - a little goes a long way, but she does the heavy lifting of keeping my hair shiny, soft and smooth on a weekly basis. I highly, highly recommend this trio and I will continue to use it as my holy grail hair care.

reviews.review_text: Olaplex has always been one of my favorite brands of haircare products. They make such effective products for all hair needs. The results are long-lasting, too! The kit contains a pre-shampoo treatment, a shampoo, and a conditioner-such a good value! The treatment is applied before shampooing, left on for like 10 mins, and rinsed out. It can be used up to 3 times a week depending on the amount of hair damage. I use it twice a week. Just the pre-shampoo treatment alone has already made an extreme difference in my hair. The shampoo has a thick consistency to it, but I can tell that it has nothing but good ingredients for my hair. The conditioner feels like silk when applied; very luxurious. The shampoo and conditioner both lathered up perfectly, just the right amount of suds, and washed away easily, too. All 3 products didn't have a strong scent-they have more of a subtle and clean smell. All 3 of these products in this kit have done so much for my hair! I'm seeing less frizz, fly aways, split ends, breakage, and all the other signs of hair damage. My hair looks and feels healthier, stronger, shiny, and put together! Olaplex has definitely saved the day and saved my hair! I know that I'm protected from future damage as well. I couldn't be more grateful!

reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying any products from Olaplex. I found the packaging fun and the bottles are a great design with a sturdy cap that can be set upside down to ensure I get the complete product out of the bottle. While I routinely use a shampoo and conditioner the pre-shampoo treatment was new for me, but works really easily. I was able to run this through damp hair and let it sit while getting ready for my shower.  The shampoo is very thick and produces a rich lather that almost reminds me of dish soap. Provides an effective clean and rinses out cleanly, leaving my hair, feeling clean without being stripped of moisture. The conditioner is a bit thin for my liking, but sits on my hair nicely and felt very hydrating and nourishing when rinsing.  Overall, my hair feels a bit more nourished, and Iu2019m excited to see long-term with the benefits will be from using this kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Lyndsey. I have been in the hair industry for what feeels like forever. As a licensed cosmetologist of over 13 years years of experience, Iu2019m always on the lookout for products that  deliver real results. Olaplex has been a big name in the industry for years. I had shied away from it for a short while but am thankful I had the opportunity to try it again. First and foremost, the formulation of this is outstanding. . I noticed an immediate difference in the texture of my hair after just one use. The conditioner has a rich,  consistency that applies smoothly and detangles effortlessly without overwhelming my hair. This is crucial, especially for clients with damaged or chemically treated hair.  One of the standout features is its ability to add remarkable shine. After using my hair had an enviable glossy finish that looked like it had just been professionally styled with minimal effort. The shine wasnu2019t greasy or artificial; it had a natural luster that highlighted the health and vitality of my hair. This is a huge plus for clients who want to achieve a salon-quality look at home.  Another positive aspect is the kits scent. It has a subtle, fresh fragrance that lingers just enough to be pleasant without being overpowering. This makes the product enjoyable to use.  In terms of strengthening, I observed a noticeable improvement in hair resilience. My hair felt less brittle and I could feel the strength in my light bangs after the first week of use. Porosity appeared better as well. This shows olaplexes ability to enhance the hairu2019s structural integrity. For those with fragile or damaged hair, this kit is an excellent choice to help restore strength and vitality.

reviews.review_title: A good gift set to try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good gift set, this is my favorite time of year when I am able to try products I typically wouldnu2019t purchase on their own. Case in point- the pre shampoo that comes with this set. I would have never thought to purchase something like this on its own, but it makes sense as a bond builder for you hair.   This was my first time using Olaplex shampoo and conditioner. I liked how well the shampoo lathered up, I love me a really good lather. The conditioner seemed to do its job, my hair was fairly easy to brush out after showering.   I didnu2019t notice much of a difference after my first use, but after a few I do think that my hair is a bit stronger and I am experiencing less breakage and fallout.   On a personal note I wish there was more of a scent to the set. I have fairly long thick hair and like my hair products to have a lasting fragrance.

I was really excited to try the Olaplex Strong Days Ahead Shampoo and Conditioner Set, having heard great things about Olaplexu2019s hair-strengthening benefits. The set includes a pre-shampoo protector, shampoo, and conditioner, aiming for stronger, smoother hair.  The good news is that the conditioner lived up to some expectations, making my hair incredibly smooth and soft, which was a treat. However, the shampoo didnu2019t impress me. Its distinct smell was off-putting and hard to get used to. Most disappointing, the set didnu2019t address my main concern: hair loss. Despite hoping for a boost in thickness and reduced hair fall, I saw no improvement. If smooth hair is your goal, the conditioner might be worth trying. But for hair loss issues, this set may not be the solution youu2019re looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an esthetician who's been in the beauty industry over 13 years formulation efficacy matters a lot to me. I'd rather invest my money in hair/skin/body products that are going to do what they are advertised than waste money on watered down time/money wasting products. What I like about olaplex as a haircare brand is that you can trust them to make products effective and as concentrated as needed for salon-quality results. This kit is essentially a no-brainer because it comes with their no3 hair perfector, as well their full sized shampoo and conditioner! I haven't been using the no3 for very long but what I like about it is that it visibly restores and strengthens your hair from within. My hair felt softer and looked shinier after one use of the no. 3! You use this product on wet hair and rinse out before shampooing. I think my favorite product in the kit has to be the shampoo. I love the smell and how clean it gets your hair while still being hydrating. I always shampoo my hair twice and I loved how clean it go my hair without feeling stripped. I'm going to be honest while I like the conditioner it's probably not my favorite out of the three products. I think because it's a daily conditioner it's just not as deeply moisturizing as say a deep conditioning mask but because it's not supposed to be so for that reason I can't deduct a star. It does what it's supposed to and that's great. I did apply an oleplex leave in product after washing my hair because it's quite coarse/dry so it needs the extra moisture. My ends are feeling very soft and I know in large part it's because of the kit! For those reasons I would recommend this kit!  The review was collected as part of a promotion.
